body: Role DefinitionThe Junior Security Officer role covers security support for Global Services Center (GSC) Romania part of the Global Services Operations (GSO) organization within Business Unit Global Services (BUGS).ReportingThe Junior Security Officer will report to the Head of Security and Risk Management - GSC Romania and will work project-based under the supervision of one or more Security Officers.Key ResponsibilitiesEnsures support for Security, Privacy and Business Continuity related activities performed within GSC Romania;Follows-up with the Line Management organization in GSC Romania that appropriate security controls are implemented by the operational teams in their ways of working;Ensures support for the deployment of specific processes that drive compliancy to Ericsson Security steering documents, Ericsson Business Continuity Management framework and customer Security and Privacy requirements;Delivers security awareness presentations to GSC Romania internal stakeholders;Supports internal product/service development projects by ensuring that the applicable information security aspects are considered;Ensures support for the driver responsible for setting up GSC Romania's Crisis team (Tiger team) and enables connecting the local Crisis team in the Regional Crisis Management Task Force (CMTF) structure;Ensures support for global or Business Unit Security related initiatives upon request.Role RequirementsEducationUniversity degree.Key competenciesThe key technical qualifications required are:2 years of work experience in IT/Telecom/Security or connex fields, having hands-on past exposure to at least two of the following areas:Information Security; Physical Security; Risk Management; Crisis Management; Business Continuity Management; Data Protection and Privacy; Audits and Assessments. Preferably knowledge of ISO/IEC 27k family of standards (with focus on ISO/IEC 27001, 27002 and 27005);Preferably knowledge on Ericsson Security Policies, Directives and Guidelines;Preferably knowledge on Ericsson’s business environment;Preferably knowledge on GSC Romania’s products and services. The non-technical competencies required are:Self-driven, self-motivated and working well under pressure;Performance and results oriented;Skilled in interpersonal communication and ability to communicate effectively at various levels in the organization;Customer oriented and business minded, having a consultative approach and focusing on obtaining superior quality within established deadlines;Ability to prioritize and plan own work to meet assigned schedules and targets;Analytic with superior problem solving capability;Knowledge sharing oriented by actively contributing with own experiences and skills to create a learning culture;Good English language skills, both oral and written.
title: Junior Security Officer
locations: West Gate Park, București, Municipiul București, România
